experience.title: Software Engineer
info: Worked on transitioning a Monolithic Robotics cloud lab into a group of microservices, making the application environment more scalable
Contributor in integrating an Electronic Lab Notebook with a cloud lab platform so that scientists can model chemical reactions in the notebook and push them as tasks to be executed in the cloud lab

experience.title: Backend Developer
info: Developing REST APIs for a educational AI skill  growth platform
Automation scripts for generating user artifacts and cleaning production environment
